title: Looking for React Material UI iOS custom theming
description: Hi guys, as I see here: https://mui.com/material-ui/customization/theming/ it's possible to customize...
body_html:
Hi guys, as I see here: https://mui.com/material-ui/customization/theming/ it's possible to customize MUI.
I'm coming from framework7 (https://framework7.io/react/appbar) and really want to have an ios like theme with MUI. If anyone has it, and not for free it's not a problem. Thanks
body_markdown:
